channel.title: Prestigescape Is Here! 508! Need Development Team!
channel.description:
Alright Guys Hi Its Hevanly Arms
Ive been coding for about a year now but i know theres pros out there so i need help lol
i am looking for developers for my project Prestigescape, i am needing a source coder or client coder , also will need a gfx designer i dont mind using sources you already have but only to use it to make mine better.. i want my vps to support 508 HD This Will Goto Number One On rune locus! Im Going To Rent A Hire Powered VPS to be able to run this server ! i want to include nearly everything to my server
so far ive added
100% Perfect Switching Nex, Corp, Jad, Nomad and More Bosses Great Loyalty System With 100 Points A Hour! Donator, Super Donator Ranks with features Great Cpu Usage Fullscreen With NO LAG Player, Firemaking, Npc and region Clipping Npc tile clipping Aura's Ingame Working Bank Pins Bank Searching Squeal Of Fortune Donor only zone, Including donor checks New monster's teleporting interface Supers&Overload Making with herblore New item models, Torva, Bandos and more 120 Dungeoneering, With great dung system Full construction With all private house and public zone! Some 508 Maps! Staff Tab, With online and offline status Dominion Tower, Castle Wars and many more minigames New Gambling Systems set up, Lottery, Gambling wizard Dwarf Multi cannon two worlds with switching Custom Interfaces new context menu's
i want much much more like: Grand Exchange summoning +more! hopefully everything to make my server number 1 With as little lag as possible also to make a great
in this server i want to be able to have a PERFECT economy! not like these others servers where you start and yu get 10m? lol anyway if your intrested to be part of this project. reply to this message. thank you :)
VPS INFO ; 32GB RAM 2 x 1000GB 7200RPM SATA Operating System :Windows 2008 R2 Standard Cisco ASA 5505 Firewall 750 GB Data Transfer Basically The VPS is A Beast... Now Heres The Following Information YOU need To Fill Out!
Choose one of these Ranks you would like to be......? Server Programmer?(Own Rank) Client Programmer? (Own Rank) GFX Designer? ( Own Rank) Head Coder? (Will Get Coder Rank ingame (Same As Admin))
Write Below
Your Name. What Rank. Experience. Msn/Email.
To contact me my msn is saeedsaeedsaeed@live.com Hope to see you soon Thanks Hevanly Arms

item.title: Prestigescape Is Here! 508! Need Development Team!
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Why

are

you

talking

like

this?
Lay your thread out neatly, use proper grammar, and good luck.
Also, show your experience.
This:

ive taken a java course so im new but i would like help..
Doesn't cut it.

Read full topic
item.source: Prestigescape Is Here! 508! Need Development Team!
